name: To the Moon: We're Out of Stock!
name_original: To the Moon: We're Out of Stock!
description:
hey! this game jam's theme was "Out of Stock."

play as an "average fellow" who's just trying to get in on that sweet, GameStoop moolah...

but they can't get any stock because it's been sent to the moon.

i wanted to use this jam as an opportunity to try and create an Animal Crossing-like dialogue system from scratch. i'm really glad it worked out, but for obvious reasons, i had really limited time to work on the actual *game* part! this thing is basically a 2 minute demo at best :)

music is "Back Home" from HeatleyBros @ "Back Home" by HeatleyBros - Royalty Free Game Music - YouTube. they are superheroes.
